recipes.title: Veggie Carbonara
recipes.description: A creamy pasta dish made with plant-based ingredients, perfect for a comforting vegan meal.

recipes.title: Mutton Chopsticks
recipes.description: Delicious mutton stir-fried with crunchy vegetables, served with noodles for a savory meal.

recipes.title: Ramen Noodles
recipes.description: Classic ramen noodles served in a rich broth with veggies, egg, and your choice of protein.

recipes.title: Tofu Stir Fry
recipes.description: A flavorful stir-fry with tofu and seasonal vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: A hearty, spiced chickpea curry cooked in a rich tomato and coconut milk base, served with basmati rice.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: A savory beef tenderloin wrapped in puff pastry with mushrooms and prosciutto, baked to perfection.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.description: A simple yet flavorful pasta dish made with olive oil, garlic, chili flakes, and fresh parsley.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Grilled chicken served on a bed of fresh romaine lettuce, topped with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.

recipes.title: Vegan Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: A flavorful bowl filled with seasoned rice, black beans, avocado, corn, salsa, and a tangy lime dressing.
